00050 IIterativeClosestPointPtr IterativeClosestPointFactory::createIterativeClosestPoint() {
00051         IPointCorrespondence* assigner = new PointCorrespondenceKDTree();;
00052         IRigidTransformationEstimation* estimator = new RigidTransformationEstimationSVD();
00053         IIterativeClosestPointPtr icp(new IterativeClosestPoint(assigner, estimator));
00054         icpConfigurator = boost::dynamic_pointer_cast<IIterativeClosestPointSetup>(icp);
00055         return icp;
00056 }
00057 
00058 IIterativeClosestPointPtr IterativeClosestPointFactory::createIterativeClosestPoint(std::string configurationFile) {
00059         if (((configurationFile.compare("")) == 0) || (configurationFile.compare("default") == 0)) {
00060                 return createIterativeClosestPoint();
00061         }
00062 
00063         ConfigurationFileHandler configReader(configurationFile);
00064         if (configReader.getErrorsOccured()) {
00065                 cout << "WARNING: Errors during parsing configuration file. Factory fill provide default configuration." << endl;
00066                 return createIterativeClosestPoint();
00067         }
00068 
00069         std::stringstream summary;
00070         summary << "#################### ICP Configuration ####################" << endl << "#" <<endl;
00071 
00072         /* set up icp */
00073         IIterativeClosestPointPtr icp; //abstract interface to ICP
00074 //      IIterativeClosestPointSetupPtr icpConfigurator; //setup interface
00075 
00076         string icpImplementation;
00077         configReader.getAttribute("IterativeClosestPoint", "implementation", &icpImplementation);
00078 
00079         if (icpImplementation.compare("IterativeClosestPoint") == 0) {
00080                 IPointCorrespondence* assigner;
00081                 IRigidTransformationEstimation* estimator;
00082                 string subalgorithm;
00083                 summary << "# Implementation: IterativeClosestPoint" << endl;
00084 
00085                 /* process assigner */
00086                 if(configReader.getSubAlgorithm("IterativeClosestPoint", "PointCorrespondence", &subalgorithm)) {
00087                         if (subalgorithm.compare("PointCorrespondenceKDTree") == 0) {
00088                                 assigner = new PointCorrespondenceKDTree();
00089                                 summary << "#  Subalgorithm: " << subalgorithm << endl;
00090 //                      } else if (...) {       //add more implemetation here
00091 
00092                         } else {
00093                                 cout << "WARNING: PointCorrespondence implementation not found. Factory fill provide default configuration: PointCorrespondenceKDTree" << endl;
00094                                         assigner = new PointCorrespondenceKDTree();
00095                                         summary << "#  Subalgorithm: PointCorrespondenceKDTree (DEFAULT)" << endl;
00096                         }
00097                 } else {
00098                         cout << "WARNING: PointCorrespondence implementation not found. Factory fill provide default configuration: PointCorrespondenceKDTree" << endl;
00099                         assigner = new PointCorrespondenceKDTree();
00100                         summary << "#  Subalgorithm: PointCorrespondenceKDTree (DEFAULT)" << endl;
00101                 }
00102 
00103                 /* process estimator */
00104                 if(configReader.getSubAlgorithm("IterativeClosestPoint", "RigidTransformationEstimation", &subalgorithm)) {
00105                         if (subalgorithm.compare("RigidTransformationEstimationSVD") == 0) {
00106                                 estimator = new RigidTransformationEstimationSVD();
00107                                 summary << "#  Subalgorithm: " << subalgorithm << endl;
00108 
00109                         } else if (subalgorithm.compare("RigidTransformationEstimationAPX") == 0) {
00110                                 estimator = new RigidTransformationEstimationAPX();
00111                                 summary << "#  Subalgorithm: " << subalgorithm << endl;
00112 
00113                         } else if (subalgorithm.compare("RigidTransformationEstimationHELIX") == 0) {
00114                                 estimator = new RigidTransformationEstimationHELIX();
00115                                 summary << "#  Subalgorithm: " << subalgorithm << endl;
00116 
00117                         } else if (subalgorithm.compare("RigidTransformationEstimationQUAT") == 0) {
00118                                 estimator = new RigidTransformationEstimationQUAT();
00119                                 summary << "#  Subalgorithm: " << subalgorithm << endl;
00120 
00121                         } else if (subalgorithm.compare("RigidTransformationEstimationORTHO") == 0) {
00122                                 estimator = new RigidTransformationEstimationORTHO();
00123                                 summary << "#  Subalgorithm: " << subalgorithm << endl;
00124 
00125 //                      } else if (...) {       //add more implementation here
00126 
00127                         } else {
00128                                 cout << "WARNING: RigidTransformationEstimation implementation not found. Factory fill provide default configuration: RigidTransformationEstimationSVD" << endl;
00129                                 estimator = new RigidTransformationEstimationSVD();
00130                                 summary << "#  Subalgorithm: RigidTransformationEstimationSVD (DEFAULT)" << endl;
00131                         }
00132 
00133                 } else {
00134                         cout << "WARNING: RigidTransformationEstimation implementation not found. Factory fill provide default configuration: RigidTransformationEstimationSVD" << endl;
00135                         estimator = new RigidTransformationEstimationSVD();
00136                         summary << "#  Subalgorithm: RigidTransformationEstimationSVD (DEFAULT)" << endl;
00137                 }
00138 
00139 
00140                 icp = IIterativeClosestPointPtr(new IterativeClosestPoint(assigner, estimator));
00141                 boost::shared_ptr<IterativeClosestPoint> icpTmpHandle = boost::dynamic_pointer_cast<IterativeClosestPoint>(icp); //downcast
00142                 icpConfigurator = boost::dynamic_pointer_cast<IIterativeClosestPointSetup>(icp); //upcast to setup interface
00143 
00144         } else { //Neither IterativeClosestPoint6DSLAM nor IterativeClosestPoint
00145                 cout << "WARNING: Errors during parsing configuration file. Factory fill provide default configuration." << endl;
00146                 return createIterativeClosestPoint();
00147         }
00148 
00149         /*
00150          * process parameters of icp
00151          */
00152 //      IIterativeClosestPointSetup* icpConfigurator;
00153 
00154 //      std::tr1::shared_ptr<Basesp0(new Derived); // http://bytes.com/topic/c/answers/542252-boost-shared_ptr-polymorphism
00155 //      std::tr1::shared_ptr<Derivedsp1 = dynamic_pointer_cast<Derived>(sp0);
00156 //      boost::shared_ptr<Derived> dp=boost::dynamic_pointer_cast<Derived>(bp);
00157 
00158 
00159         assert(icpConfigurator != 0); //cast worked => icp implementation implements IIterativeClosestPointSetup interface
00160 
00161         int maxIterations;
00162         if (configReader.getAttribute("IterativeClosestPoint", "maxIterations", &maxIterations)) {
00163                 icpConfigurator->setMaxIterations(maxIterations);
00164         }
00165 
00166         double convergenceThreshold;
00167         if (configReader.getAttribute("IterativeClosestPoint", "convergenceThreshold", &convergenceThreshold)) {
00168                 icpConfigurator->setConvergenceThreshold(convergenceThreshold);
00169         }
00170 
00171         summary << "#" << endl << "# Parameters:" << endl;
00172         summary << "#  maxIterations = " << icpConfigurator->getMaxIterations() << endl;
00173         summary << "#  convergenceThreshold = " << icpConfigurator->getConvergenceThreshold() << endl;
00174         summary << "#" << endl << "###########################################################" << endl;
00175 
00176         LOG(INFO) << "Summary: " << std::endl << summary.str();
00177 
00178         return icp;
00179 
00180 }
00181 
00182 IIterativeClosestPointSetupPtr IterativeClosestPointFactory::getIcpSetupHandle() {
00183         return this->icpConfigurator;
00184 }
